issue.title: [JS] Update status docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17979](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17979). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow JS support nulls, sparse, and dense unions.
